感觉现在大家对于守望先锋的看法普遍分成了激进派和保守派两个极端。激进派会用激烈的言语攻击这款游戏，而保守派则会认为激进派的攻击太过于保守了。

猫

从前，我养了一只猫，我有十块钱，会用八块钱给它买吃的，经常给它洗澡，它也很粘我。

后来，我带它出去玩，路人觉得它很可爱，他们给它喂猫粮，火腿肠，我很不开心，因为它是我的。我想把它抱回家，可是它挣脱我，冲着给它好吃的人喵喵，我抱了几次他都不跟我走，还挠伤了我，于是我转身就走了.....

后来，偶然在路上遇到了它，它身上脏兮兮的。路人们只会给它好吃的，陪它玩玩，却不会带它回家，给它洗澡。它看到我后就跟着我回家，我把它关在了门外，它在门外喵喵地叫着，叫的我很难受，
可是我不会再要它了
。

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.


不是人们抛弃了守望先锋。而是守望先锋不会是玩家的英雄了。再也不会是了。It's not that people abandoned Overwatch. It's that Overwatch won't be the player's hero anymore. Not Anymore.

Let's be honest...people who make OW porn work WAY harder on what they do than the developers do. Blizzard is more interested in "The Message™" than they are on making a good game, and even more than that, they're interested in squeezing every dime out of low IQ players. Don't be a low IQ player and buy the battlepass, which is amazingly more predatory than loot boxes ever were.

The game is horribly unbalanced, the community is more toxic than the GTA community and CoD community COMBINED, and the SBMM will ensure that you have the worst experience playing the game. SBM isn't there to ensure you have a "fair and balanced" experience, it's there to ensure you're always going to sweat your brains out and rage.

i bought Overwatch back in 2016 and had a blast with it, hundred of hours of pure fun.
but then for some weird reason Blizzard took my game, and replaced it with this abomination. no fun, forcing me to pay for everything, despite the fact that i've PAID FOR THIS GAME full price just few years ago, now they also add new heroes that i have to pay for, and never delivered anything they promised when OW2 was announced. they replaced game i loved with inferior product, and refuse to refund the money. OW2 is a cashgrab, a wicked attempt to generate more revenue on a popular game they've made years ago, shame for Blizzard, and a bigger shame, because millions of players got screwed over without any compensation.
Overwatch 2 is WORSE in EVERY aspect compared to first one, literally. it's much worse version of the game that millions of people bough and loved, and we can never get back the game we paid for.

So this is getting review bombed which is idiotic. This plays well, I have it on Blizzards Launcher and now steam so I can boot up on my steam deck. It plays great on the steam deck, default is medium settings and plays at a solid 60fps. Trackpads work by default so aiming is a breeze. I’m sure there are some
legitimate criticisms from other reviewers but most negative reviews are people jumping on the bandwagon

TLDR: Overwatch 2 is a literal scam. It's the same bullshit you see from Kickstarter games that scam people out of funding with proof of concepts and promises and then just never deliver on them. Don't give this game your money or your attention.

Blizzard shut down Overwatch 1 (which was a game we paid 40 USD for) under the guise of releasing a free sequel with a brand new, in depth PvE campaign. In truth, they just used the opportunity to switch to a more greedy microtransaction model; introducing a battle pass (which the previously-free new characters were now locked behind) and making it nigh-impossible to get skins without shelling out for them. And *after* it released, and OW1 was shut down, they said, "Oopsie woopsie, that in-depth PvE mode that we promised on release, that's still not in the game? Yeah we just don't have the ability to do such a thing. The technology just doesn't exist, it's too hard!" And they threw the one loose reason they had for switching to OW2 in the trash. It was always just about trying to suck more money out of people. (Which, sidebar, is fucking insane given the fact that OW1 was MASSIVELY popular and people spent shitloads of money on the game already)

The cherry on top is that Blizzard is now releasing a PvE game mode that you have to pay extra for. A company that treats its playerbase like cash cows and morons deserves to fail.

TL;DR of what everyone has said:
Core game good, Devs and monetization bad

我是ow1的老玩家。b测首测和末测都有我。
这游戏刚开始时说不好听点，o神如果说是抄塞尔达，那ow有资格说抄的tf2。天使那感觉就像medic复刻出来的一样，法鸡也像极了士兵，但定位不太一样。

第二次我有这种感觉是在玩鹅厂的一款游戏叫王牌战士。

说回这个 游戏，我的小美当时玩的谁见了都说好，甚至被路人队友问是不是打职业的，但就是黄金段位，为什么？因为没有固定的水平正常的队友，一直在排路人局。
路人局是一人若至全员坐牢。更新慢我不怕，我怕被排位系统制裁，很抱歉排位系统就是tm制裁我，我玩游戏为开心，玩ow的年月让我英文骂街的水平突飞猛进。

然后我就弃坑这个游戏了。直到现在我又下载了下来，拿了一堆2.4%的成就，专门为给这个游戏差评。
这个游戏我认识了很多有趣的人，但这本身并不是一款好游戏，制作运营他的游戏公司——暴雪也并不是一个优秀的游戏公司。

我真诚的建议各位，别碰这游戏。能让你玩爽并不是暴雪的追求目标，让你花钱才是暴雪追求的目标。
公司必须要盈利，你不用跟一个学金融的说这个，但我宁可找那些给与我满足和快乐的游戏花钱，让他们盈利，做大，做强，做出更好玩的游戏，让他们对得起报表使用者和玩家。
而不是跟中国游戏公司学坏了的，认为“自己赚的钱里一半是挨骂钱”才正常的暴雪这类公司赚钱。
说真的，小时候上自然课时，我们班有人好死不死拿可乐瓶装肥水，我不幸咕咚咕咚过。
玩暴雪游戏，看暴雪赚钱，比咕咚咕咚奥利给还难受。
